title: Nuclear fusion reaction system
assignees: Shanghai Hongpeng Energy Technology Co ltd
abstract: The present invention relates to a nuclear fusion reaction system which comprises the following components: a reaction container; a fuel injector which provides at least one thermonuclear fuel; and at least one pair of plasma generator which is adjacent to the reaction container and is used for forming plasma beams that are oriented to a gathering area in the reaction container from the thermonuclear fuel supplied from the fuel injector through applying current and pinching the plasma beams to a lightening, wherein the plasma generator causes the current to drive the lightening to impact in the gathering area for causing fusion reaction.
claims:
2. nuclear fusion reaction system according to claim 1, wherein,
      The electric current that described plasma maker applies, from one end of beam-plasma, forms loop by beam-plasma and the other end that converges region arrival beam-plasma.

3. nuclear fusion reaction system according to claim 1, further comprises:
      Start conductor, have the shape of hollow pipeline, described plasma maker is connected to and converges region, for guiding beam-plasma to arrive, converge region, by vapourizing temperature, the conductive material lower than 4000K forms described startup conductor.

4. nuclear fusion reaction system according to claim 3, wherein,
      The hollow space that described startup conductor has has the diameter of 1 millimeter of magnitude, and the material of described startup conductor comprises copper or graphite.

5. nuclear fusion reaction system according to claim 1, wherein,
      Described fusionable material is that D atom quantity number percent is at least the seawater of 0.01% light water, purification and goes at least one in deimpurity seawater.

6. nuclear fusion reaction system according to claim 5, wherein,
      When fusionable material comprises the seawater of described light water or purification, oxygen atom is wherein as the catalyzer of fusion reaction; And
      When fusionable material comprises deimpurity seawater, oxygen atom wherein, Na ion and Cl ion are as the catalyzer of fusion reaction.

7. nuclear fusion reaction system according to claim 1, further comprises:
      Pressure apparatus, is connected with described plasma generator, for controlling the flow velocity of the fusionable material that enters described plasma generator.

8. nuclear fusion reaction system according to claim 2, wherein, at least one pair of plasma generator makes produced lightning converge the positive head-on collision in region described, and leaves described reaction vessel from the direction different from described head-on collision direction.

10. nuclear fusion reaction system according to claim 9, wherein,
      Further make the line of homophase terminal of each plasma generator orthogonal.

11. according to the nuclear fusion reaction system described in claim 9 or 10, wherein,
      Regulate phase differential and the frequency of the alternating current that a plasma generator applies, thereby realize different collision effects.

Nuclear fusion reaction system in 13. according to Claim 8-12 described in any one, wherein, at least collision before, the direction of at least one beam-plasma and the opposite direction of current flowing.
14. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 13, wherein, at least, before collision, the direction of at least one beam-plasma is identical with the direction of current flowing.

15. according to the nuclear fusion reaction system of claim 1, further comprises laser-ignition unit, and described laser-ignition unit is for increase the energy density that converges region when lightning clashes, thus initiated core fusion reaction.
16. according to the nuclear fusion reaction system described in any one in claim 1-10 and 12, and wherein, described nuclear fusion reaction system comprises 2-108 plasma generator.
17. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 16, wherein, described nuclear fusion reaction system comprises 2,3,7,10,12,15,18,20,24,30,36,72 or 108 plasma generators.

18. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 1, at least one method that wherein said plasma maker utilizes direct supply, AC power, charged particle to enter in emitter and induction current method applies electric current.

19. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 1, wherein said plasma maker comprises the power supply with terminal, the terminal that a plurality of plasma makers can common source is to form beam-plasma.

21. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, wherein,
      The electric current that described plasma maker applies, from one end of beam-plasma, forms loop by beam-plasma and the other end that converges region arrival beam-plasma.

22. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, further comprise:
      Start conductor, have the shape of hollow pipeline, described startup conductor is as described admission passage and leaving channel, and by vapourizing temperature, the conductive material lower than 4000K forms described startup conductor.

23. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, wherein,
      Described fusionable material is that D atom quantity number percent is at least the seawater of 0.01% light water, purification and goes at least one in deimpurity seawater.

24. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 23, wherein,
      When fusionable material comprises the seawater of described light water or purification, oxygen atom is wherein as the catalyzer of fusion reaction; And
      When fusionable material comprises deimpurity seawater, oxygen atom wherein, Na ion and Cl ion are as the catalyzer of fusion reaction.

25. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, further comprise:
      Pressure apparatus, is arranged at outside the cooled containers of nuclear fusion reaction system, for controlling the flow velocity of the fusionable material that enters described plasma generator.

26. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, wherein, described plasma generator applies electric current, make every a pair of lightning entering along described admission passage converge the positive head-on collision in region described, and along described leaving channel, leave described reaction vessel from the direction different from described admission passage.

27. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, wherein,
      Described plasma generator comprises AC power, the terminal of described AC power is arranged as to the sphere of adjacent subglobose reaction vessel and is arranged in the end of described admission passage and leaving channel, make the homophase terminal of power supply of a plasma generator symmetrical with respect to the centre of sphere.

28. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 27, wherein,
      Further make the line of homophase terminal of each plasma generator orthogonal.

29. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, wherein,
      Described plasma generator comprises direct supply, the positive terminal of described direct supply and negative terminal are arranged as to the sphere of adjacent subglobose reaction vessel and are arranged in the end of described admission passage and leaving channel, make the positive terminal of each power supply and negative terminal symmetrical with respect to the centre of sphere.

30. according to the nuclear fusion reaction system described in claim 27-29 any one, and wherein, at least, before collision, the direction of at least one beam-plasma is identical with the direction of current flowing.
31. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 30, wherein, at least collision before, the direction of at least one beam-plasma and the opposite direction of current flowing.
32. according to the nuclear fusion reaction system described in claim 20-29 any one, and wherein, described nuclear fusion reaction system comprises 2-108 plasma generator.
33. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 32, wherein, described nuclear fusion reaction system comprises 2,3,7,10,12,15,18,20,24,30,36,72 or 108 plasma generators.

34. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, one or more methods that wherein said plasma maker utilizes direct supply, AC power, charged particle to enter in emitter and induction current method apply electric current.

35. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, wherein said plasma maker comprises the power supply with terminal, the terminal that a plurality of plasma makers can common source is to form beam-plasma.
36. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 35, the number of wherein said input channel is different from the number of output channel.

37. nuclear fusion reaction systems according to claim 20, also comprise non-plasma generator arranged in pairs, for generating beam-plasma and constriction becomes lightning, to converge region described reaction vessel public and other lightnings converge generation fusion reaction.
38. according to the nuclear fusion reaction system described in claim 1 or 20, wherein fusion container be spherical, elliposoidal, cylindrical or square in a kind of.

39. according to the nuclear fusion reaction system described in claim 1 or 20, wherein said reaction vessel comprises that at least one does not apply the passage of electric current, for: (1) flows into liquid coolant, and (2) flow out liquid coolant, (3) flow out fusion products, and/or (4) flow out unburned material.
